content.question:
Which of the following correctly identifies both a nonpoint source and a point source of pollution?
Nonpoint Source Pollution Point Source Pollution (A) Industrial smokestack Waste discharge pipe (B) Agricultural runoff Urban runoff (C) Leaking sanitary landfill Pesticide spraying (D) Urban runoff City bus exhaust

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
